original_body_lines: Despite the Sri Lanka Rupee (SLR) falling slightly against the US Dollar (USD) yesterday, it has appreciated against the USD today.
According to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL), today's buying rate of an USD is Rs. 287.87 while the selling rate is Rs. 300.92.
The buying rate stood at Rs. 290.67 yesterday while the selling rate was Rs. 303.95.
